text: “ ‘Abaho mulava nhosa yasole mkono wa ija ing'hondolo wa kimbigalo kuno ukimusigwe, yamgwee mmakono munhu ayo yaiduwile yahamambukiza kubea mvili zake ziyakalile nazo viyailavile kwa Mndewa Imulungu na vivija yamgwee andazi dimoja hadigeligwe hamila kulawa mkigelo na kigate kimoja kisisili hakigeligwe hamila.
